metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9434 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Crypto++ (aka cryptopp) through 5.6.5 contains an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in zinflate.cpp in the Inflator filter. It was discovered that Crypto++ mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to leak potentially sensitive information.

criterions.comment: libcrypto++: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
